introduction: Hi there, in this session I am going to ask you questions about food. Are you ready to start?
long: Please tell me about the kind of food you usually eat during a normal week.
Could you talk about your favorite meal and why you like it?
How often do you eat at restaurants?
How do you usually plan out your weekly meals?
What kind of food do you think is healthiest for you?
short: Which do you like better, pasta or rice?
Which do you like better, pizza or hamburgers?
Which do you like better, ice cream or candy?
How many times a week do you eat candy?
How many times a week do you eat pizza?
How many times a week do you eat pasta?
